p: For the LOS PV module, we focused on two genes, lgtG and NMB1255. Repeat tracts ranged between 7 and 16 for these genes ( Data File S1). The cc23 and cc60 isolates exhibited higher levels of “on” expression states than other isolates (see Fig. S6). A significant decrease in “on” expression states of these genes in cc174 and cc60 carriers is indicative of selection against certain immunotypes ( Fig. 4). PV of NMB1255 was higher than for lgtG, while diversity within time points was generally low, suggesting that these LOS epitopes are subject to infrequent but strongly selective shifts in expression (see Fig. S6).
